div.bibl: Dziennik Chicagoski, Dec. 15, 1894. ST. STANISLAUS KOSTKA PARISH DRAMATIC CIRCLE STAGES PROGRAM

body.p: Dispensing with dances and other social functions during the year of national mourning. The St. Stanislaus Kostka parish Dramatical Circle staged a patriotic program last night at the school hall.
1. "The Year of National Mourning and the Stand of the Dramatic Circle," S. Zahajkiewicz.
5. "Last," duet, by Miss Lazarska and Mr. Robakowski.
7. "The Fatherland", duet, Mrs. Anna Jozwiakowska and Mr. Zahajkiewicz.
10. "An Old Man and An Evil Spirit," declamation.
11. A Rose on a Grave," song, Mr. Zahajkiewicz.
12. "Modulation of the Voice," a talk, Mr. Zahajkiewicz.
All the numbers of the program were delivered in good style and were generously applauded by the audience.
The affair was concluded at 10 P.M.
